item.title: Forestry Service Roads
item.author: Logan Senko
item.description: Constructed lesson content, designed safety course, devised evaluation criteria, drafted policy, and created reference materials for traveling on Alberta's forestry service roads (FSRs)

item.title: Pipelines & Procedures
item.author: Author
item.description: Evaluated existing documentation and generated a set of recommendations which addressed maintenance, accessibility, and information architecture.

item.title: City of Calgary, Documentation
item.author: Logan Senko
item.description: Develop an original information architecture from scratch using Microsoft Word to structure and construct a series of templates .

item.title: Onboarding & Procedures
item.author: Author
item.description: Identified the unique barriers of onboarding inexperienced and remote employees and revised the existing documentation to reflect those needs and reduce said barriers.
